additionalGoals.name: Website Migration
additionalGoals.raw:
# ðŸŒ Website Migration â€” Strikingly â†’ GitHub Pages

## Status: TODO (noted Feb 10, 2026)

## Objective
Move all personal websites from Strikingly to GitHub Pages (or similar static hosting). Same approach as everclaw.xyz â€” static sites, GitHub repos, custom domains.

## Websites to Migrate
1. www.basedai.co
2. www.austinagentweek.com
3. www.promptrank.org
4. www.myai.foundation
5. www.settlers.space
6. www.davidajohnston.me
7. www.smartcontractrank.org
8. www.smartagent.org
9. www.freeaiday.org
10. www.agentrank.org
11. www.mor.builders
12. www.savannahstuff.me
13. www.decentralizeai.org
14. www.freemansjourney.com
15. www.ethagent.org
16. www.polygonagent.org
17. www.smartagency.ai
18. www.johnstonslaw.org
19. www.voluntarist.co
20. www.journeytofreedom.me
21. NetworkNation.org

## Design Tool
- Consider Loveable (lovable.dev) â€” AI-powered website builder
- Could generate React/static sites that deploy to GitHub Pages
- Need to evaluate vs hand-coded static sites vs other tools

## Approach
- Scrape existing Strikingly sites for content/structure
- Rebuild as static sites (HTML/CSS or React via Loveable)
- Host on GitHub Pages with custom domains
- Migrate DNS records one at a time

## Priority
- Not urgent â€” future project after Everclaw stabilizes
- basedai.co and davidajohnston.me likely highest priority

keyFacts.heading: Everclaw Skill (profbernardoj/everclaw)
keyFacts.content:
### Current Version: v0.9.2
- OpenClaw skill for decentralized AI inference via Morpheus network
- Website: everclaw.xyz (GitHub Pages from docs/)
- Repo: profbernardoj/everclaw on GitHub
### Architecture
- **Morpheus proxy:** `~/morpheus/proxy/morpheus-proxy.mjs` (port 8083, launchd: com.morpheus.proxy)
- **Morpheus proxy-router (Go):** `~/morpheus/` (port 8082)
- **Proxy auth:** Bearer token `morpheus-local`
- **OpenClaw provider name:** `morpheus` (e.g., `morpheus/kimi-k2.5`)
- Venice IDs use

keyFacts.heading: David's Model Preferences
keyFacts.content:
- **DO NOT use:** llama-3.3-70b, deepseek-v3.2 as backup models
- Claude 4.6: complex reasoning only (expensive)
- Kimi K2.5: most cron/sub-agent work (free via Morpheus)
- GLM 4.7 Flash: trivial tasks (free, fast)
- All 10 isolated cron jobs use `morpheus/kimi-k2.5`
---

keyFacts.heading: Lessons Learned
keyFacts.content:
### Morpheus models need reasoning: false in OpenClaw config (2026-02-11)
All Morpheus provider models (kimi-k2.5, kimi-k2-thinking, glm-4.7-flash) must have `"reasoning": false` in openclaw.json. The upstream litellm rejects the `reasoning_effort` parameter â€” if set to true, cron jobs using Morpheus models fail with HTTP 400. Fixed via config.patch.
### Morpheus Proxy Error Classification (2026-02-11)
Morpheus infrastructure failures (502s) must return `type: "server_error"` not `"billing"` â€” o

keyFacts.heading: SmartAgentProtocol (GitHub Org)
keyFacts.content:
- Org: https://github.com/orgs/SmartAgentProtocol
- Role: admin/owner (profbernardoj)
- **Repo:** https://github.com/SmartAgentProtocol/smartagent (live as of Feb 12)
- **Domain:** smartagent.org (David owns, DNS pending)
- **Vision:** OpenClaw + Everclaw + sensible defaults, packaged for non-technical users
- **Architecture:** Installer-first (not fork). `curl install.sh | bash` â†’ free inference immediately
- **Primary model:** `mor-gateway/kimi-k2.5` (free via Morpheus API Gateway)
- **Workflo

keyFacts.content:
- **Balaji Srinivasan** (@balajis) â€” Network School founder, *The Network State* author
  - Network State = voluntary smart contract governance (opt-in, replaces nation-state force model)
  - 10 durable skills in AI age: vision, verification, prompting, polishing, community, geography, scarcity, cryptography, physicality, resiliency
  - Relevant to: Abolition of State goal + Family education framework
  - Full quote saved: `memory/insights/balaji-value-in-age-of-ai.md`

keyFacts.heading: Key Users
keyFacts.content: - **Barry** â€” Everclaw user, agent named Janet. Hit ClawHub collision bug upgrading v0.7â†’v0.8. Runtime infra survived but skill dir got nuked. First external user to report a bug.
